no-current-contract: This property is not rented by anyone currently.
no-contracts: It doesn't seem you rented this property before.
invitation-not-accepted-yet: The rental invitation you sent was not accepted yet.
choose-new-expiration-date: Select a new expiration date to extend the duration of your current contract.
want-terminate-contract-title: Are you sure you want to terminate this contract?
want-terminate-contract-with-renter-cont: This will remove the current renter from the property and set the expiration date of the contract to today's date.
want-terminate-contract-without-renter-c: Because this contract wasn't signed by any potential renter, it will be deleted entirely.
want-delete-contract-title: Are you sure you want to delete this contract?
want-delete-contract-with-renter-content: This will terminate the contract and delete it entirely from the platform, including from the rental history (the current renter will be removed from this property).
want-delete-contract-without-renter-cont: This will delete the contract entirely from the platform, including from the rental history.
